meanings.definition: Cut or formed with a jigsaw.
meanings.sent1: The jigsawn puzzle pieces fit perfectly together.
meanings.sent2: The jigsawn edges of the wooden toy were smooth.
meanings.sent3: The jigsawn pattern on the fabric looked like a maze.
meanings.sent4: Her jigsawn hair cascaded down her back like a waterfall.
meanings.sent5: The jigsawn design on the table was intricate and beautiful.

meanings.sent1: The jigsawn pieces were scattered across the floor.
meanings.sent2: She admired the jigsawn details on the furniture.
meanings.sent3: The jigsawn project was finally completed after hours of work.
meanings.sent4: His jigsawn creation was a masterpiece of craftsmanship.
meanings.sent5: The jigsawn image on the wall depicted a serene landscape.
